agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents requests for information that require manipulation of source data prior to creation of a final product. This series may include, but is not limited to: information requests, working drafts of reports and files, syntax and coding worksheets, transitional files, spreadsheets, macros, pivot tables, and queries.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Data Sources Files for All Other Required Testing
series_description: This series documents the associated student level files for each test administration. This series may include, but is not limited to: summary data.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Data Sources for Graduation Test Requirement
series_description: This series documents the associated student level files for each test administration for tests required for graduation. This series may include, but is not limited to: summary data.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents mandated reports for local educational agencies that do not meet state and/or federal accountability requirements. This series includes, but is not limited to: academic review reports, school improvement plans, applications, and status reports.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Scoring for All Other Required Testing
series_description: This series documents the training for qualifying readers to score student papers or tests. This series may include, but is not limited to: training materials, anchor papers, reader inter-rater reliability statistics, and appeals.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the training for qualifying readers to score student papers or tests that are required for graduation. This series may include, but is not limited to: training anchor papers, reader reports, inter-rater reliability statistics, and appeals.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the data used to create state summary reports of state testing programs by school year, such as the Literacy Passport Test, Standards of Learning, and new programs as they are developed. This series may include, but is not limited to: testing data.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the results of state testing programs by school year, such as the Literacy Passport Test, Standards of Learning, and new programs as they are developed. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the selection of educators/subject specialists from across the state to review test questions. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of academic year

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Test Development Committee Meeting Daily Operation Checklist
series_description: This series documents the meetings of committees that and review test materials. This series may include, but is not limited to: meeting minutes, procedures, discussions, and attendance.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of academic year

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the agreement of teachers, DOE staff, and others who are working with the development of test forms and questions to maintain the confidentiality thereof. This series may include, but is not limited to: signed confidentially agreements.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of academic year

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Test Development Documentation For All Other Required Testing
series_description: This series documents the development of test forms and questions. This series may include, but is not limited to: item, data, and forms reviews; selection procedures; test answer keys; and committee proceedings.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Test Development Documentation For Graduation Test Requirement
series_description: This series documents the development of the test form and questions for tests required for graduation. This series may include, but is not limited to: item, data, and forms reviews, selection procedures, test answer keys, and committee proceedings.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the review of statewide testing programs. This series may include, but is not limited to: of test procedures and informational materials.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: Documents This series documents the operations of statewide testing programs. This series may include, but is not limited to: informational materials, Authorization to Proceed records, test irregularity records, and affidavits.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Test Materials For All Other Required Testing Extra Material
series_description: This series documents the final record copy of test material. This series may include, but is not limited to: test booklets, answer documents, released items/test forms, demographic sheets, and administration manuals.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Test Materials For All Other Required Testing Recordkeeping Copy
series_description: This series documents the required testing conducted for students and the materials used in the tests. The series may include, but is not limited to: final record copy of test material, test booklets, answer documents, released items/test forms, demographic sheets, and administration manuals.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Test Materials For Graduation Test Requirement Extra material
series_description: This series documents the final record copy of test material for tests required for graduation. This series may include, but is limited to: test booklets, answer documents, released forms, demographic sheets, and administration manuals.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Test Materials For Graduation Test Requirement Recordkeeping Copy
series_description: This series documents the required testing conducted for students and the materials used in tests required for The series may include, but is not limited to: final record copy of test material, test booklets, answer documents, released items/test forms, demographic sheets, and administration manuals.
